title: DC Federal District Court Caption Schema
description: Structure for document captions per LCvR 5.1

caption_template.court_header:
UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
FOR THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA

components.name: case_type
components.description: cv for civil, cr for criminal, mc for miscellaneous

components.name: judge_initials
components.description: Assigned judge initials (e.g., ABC, JDB, RCL)

examples: MEMORANDUM IN SUPPORT OF DEFENDANT'S MOTION TO DISMISS
PLAINTIFF'S OPPOSITION TO MOTION TO DISMISS
REPLY IN SUPPORT OF MOTION TO DISMISS
COMPLAINT FOR DECLARATORY AND INJUNCTIVE RELIEF

multi_party_format.multiple_plaintiffs: List each on separate line, end with 'et al.' if many
multi_party_format.multiple_defendants: List each on separate line, end with 'et al.' if many
multi_party_format.consolidated_cases: List primary case number, note 'Consolidated with Case No. X'

special_designations.jury_demand: Add 'JURY DEMAND' or 'JURY TRIAL DEMANDED' if applicable
special_designations.related_cases: Note related case numbers if designated

judge_initials_directory.description: Common DC District Court judge initials - verify current roster
